thread.title: Technically and tactically best Arsenal should improve on results: Louis van Gaal
thread.title_full: Technically and tactically best Arsenal should improve on results: Louis van Gaal - Sports

author: IANS
title: Technically and tactically best Arsenal should improve on results: Louis van Gaal
text:
London: Manchester United coach Louis van Gaal believes that arch-rivals Arsenal should be doing better in terms of results as they are 'technically and tactically' the best team in the English Premier League.
Louis van Gaal. Pic/AFP 
"Arsenal are technically and tactically the best team in the league. Nevertheless, they haven't won so much, so you have to look for that improvement with that team," van Gaal was quoted as saying by the Daily Star.
The two sides lock horns at the Emirates Stadium in London on Sunday with United hoping to strengthen their position atop the table. Arsenal would on the other hand look to bounce back from their shock Champions League defeat to Olympiakos on Tuesday.
Van Gaal is well aware of the threat that the Arsenal team poses and their ability to come back from difficult situations.
"We are happy but I think Arsenal can come back from a defeat," the United boss said. "They have shown that a lot of times."
